marklogic.body: I think this is what will happen: Breaking news WWE thought The Undertaker vs HHH was NOT gimmicky enough so the rules are as follows: It is 60 minutes No DQ a referee will be at hand at all times to count the pins falls in this case Shawn Michaels this will have no effect on the outcome of the match. In addition a pole suspended from another pole directing in the center of the ring. Every time a wrestler Bounces of the ropes hard enough to make the pole fall down on it's own accord a sedated dog is chained to the opposing wrestler's corner maximum 5 dogs. If a wrestler is thrown over the top ropes to the floor he must take all the dogs in his corner and walk them around the perimeter of the arena. For every piece of dog shyt stepped on by the wrestler he will receive a potato. When the 60 minutes have elapsed the potatoes are taken back to the locker room where a makeshift kitchen has been constructed. The wrestlers must wash,peel and cook their potatoes into home fries/chips whatever you want to call it and will then be consumed by Mick Foley. The viewers at home will be treated to one continuous shot of Mick Foley eating all the prepared potatoes finally Foley stops to catch his breath/wipe his beard. As this happening a match will take place back in the ring to keep the live fans occupied. Once all the home fries/ chips have been consumed the results will be written on piece of paper and will be put into a sealed envelope and be given to the referee. Foley will neatly fold the envelop twice place it in his back pocket to see it crack open on a toilet seat. As soon as this happens a timer will begin counting down as the two wrestlers take turns hitting each other over the forehead barbed wire baseball bats and Bleeding each other on camera. This will continue for ten minutes or until or the floor has an even coat of blood over the entire carpet. After this has phase of the match has been completed the wrestlers will make their way back out to the ring where two more special guest referees will be added. The third one can be chosen at will but the second one has to be Shawn Waltman NOT X Pac 123 kid but Shawn Waltman. Each of them will produce a coin shaped with the face of Vince Russo's face on the head side and a picture of Vince Russo testicles on the tail side. The wrestler with the most cuts in his forehead has to call the subsequent coin toss and the winner of the coin toss will recieve a Number 1 contenders match for the US title however the loser has the option of producing a gun and shooting his opponent in the face. If this option is taken then the wrestler can cover his opponent for the pinfall and claim the No. 1 contender Spot for the US title himself. Hopefully you'll enjoy that version of Undertaker vs HHH at Mania.
